name: Add/update Mailchimp subscribers from Award Force users
description:
This template periodically extracts all users from Award Force account and uses the retrieved information to create new subscribers or update existing ones in Mailchimp. 

The template expects your MailChimp list to have at least these fields besides email:
1) First name
2) Last name

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
